name: SocialBaseUK
short_description:
SocialBase is the new addition to the social craze. It allows you to communicate with many social networks at once, giving options for using Facebook, Twitter & YouTube. We are adding other networks to the service and more features such as posting directly to your Facebook wall and many other features! Over the next few months, SocialBase will have it's first line of updates within the biggining of September 2012. Until then, the current 'Beta' app is available to download completely free of charge. All updates will not be charged for nor will future downloads. This software is OpenSource and allways will be.

SocialBase has had it's first line of updates to re-design the GUI (Graphic user interface). We have improved it's performances and looks. It's now available to download free today.
summary: SocialBase is an open source project for everyone to enjoy!
